Text: How do I get the sound?

Hey where the hell is my sound. Windows media player needs a codec that doesn't exist and DivX just won't play it. jboo7 you are a bad person for toying with people like this because i love this film. I won't be seeding it because there is no point in anyone else downloading it.
Excellent quality.  he sound worked great in Winamp, VLC, and WMP....... Thank you
